help:
Hi! I need your date of birth so I can correlate it with your name to find your records! It's also a proof of who you are. If you would like to switch user please just ask and we can start again. Or type "exit" to exit the system.
Once I've got your date of birth I can take a request to delete, retrieve or change some of your data that is on record.
I can help you retrieve or request to change any of the following:
-name
-age
-gender
-blood type
-medical condition
-date of admission
-doctor
-hospital
-insurance provider
-billing amount
-room number
-admission type
-discharge date
-medication
-test results
